mapper.select: select tmr.* from tb_merchant_rate tmr inner join tb_merchant tm on tm.id = tmr.merchant_id inner join tb_pay_channel tpc on tpc.id = tmr.channel_id where tm.merchant_no = #{merchantNo} and tpc.channel_code = #{payWay};

select tmtc.* from tb_merchant_trade_code tmtc where tmtc.id not in ( select distinct tor.trade_code_id from tb_order tor where tor.merchant_id = #{merchantId} and tor.channel_id = #{payChannelId} and tor.pay_status = 'waitPay' and create_time BETWEEN date_add(now(), interval - 5 minute) and now() ) and tmtc.merchant_id = #{merchantId} and tmtc.channel_id = #{payChannelId} and tmtc.enabled = 1

select * from (
select tmtc.* ,
( select IFNULL(count(1) ,0) from tb_order tor1 where tor1.trade_code_id = tmtc.id and ( create_time BETWEEN date_add(now(), interval - 30 minute) and now() ) and FORMAT(tor1.order_amount,2) = FORMAT(${orderAmount},2) and tor1.pay_status = 'waitPay' ) as repeatAmountNum,
( select IFNULL(count(1) ,0) from tb_order tor1 where tor1.trade_code_id = tmtc.id and TO_DAYS(tor1.create_time) = TO_DAYS(now()) ) as dayReceiveNum ,
( select IFNULL(sum(tor1.order_amount) ,0) from tb_order tor1 where tor1.pay_status = 'payed' and tor1.trade_code_id = tmtc.id and TO_DAYS(tor1.create_time) = TO_DAYS(now()) ) as dayReceiveAmount
from tb_merchant_trade_code tmtc where tmtc.id in
#{id}
) tab where (dayReceiveAmount + ${orderAmount}) <= tab.day_amount_limit order by dayReceiveNum asc , repeatAmountNum asc , dayReceiveAmount asc limit 0 , 1

select tmtc.* from tb_merchant_trade_code tmtc where tmtc.id not in ( select distinct tor.trade_code_id from tb_order tor where tor.trade_code_id = #{tradeCodeId} and tor.pay_status = 'waitPay' and create_time BETWEEN date_add(now(), interval - 5 minute) and now() ) and tmtc.id = #{tradeCodeId} and tmtc.enabled = 1

select ifnull(min(pay_float_amount) , 0) as lastAmount from tb_order where trade_code_id = #{tradeCodeId} and format(order_amount , 0) = format(${orderAmount} , 0) and TO_DAYS(create_time) = TO_DAYS(now())

select tor.id , tor.merchant_order_no merchantOrderNo , tor.platform_order_no platformOrderNo , tor.pay_way payWay , tor.order_amount orderAmount , format(tor.pay_float_amount , 2) payFloatAmount , tor.return_url returnUrl , tor.create_time createTime , tmtc.real_name realName , tmtc.code_link codeLink , tor.pay_status payStatus , tor.pay_qr_code_link payQrCodeLink from tb_order tor inner join tb_merchant_trade_code tmtc on tmtc.id = tor.trade_code_id where tor.id = #{tradeId};

select * from tb_order where trade_code_num = #{codeNum} and (create_time between date_add(now(), interval - 5 minute) and now()) and pay_status = 'waitPay' and format(pay_float_amount , 2) = format(${amount},2) and pay_qr_code_link is null
